meta.title: Maksym Hnatyshyn || Full stack developer
meta.description: My name is Maksym Hnatyshyn, I am a Full stack developer with experience working with JavaScript, React, Next.js and TypeScript. I am a graduate of the Western Ukrainian National University, majoring in Software Engineering.

aboutMe.title: Maksym Hnatyshyn
aboutMe.description1: 👋 Hello! My name is Maksym Hnatyshyn, but you can just call me Maksym.
aboutMe.description2: 👨‍💻 I am a full-stack developer with over 2 years of experience working with JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript.
aboutMe.description3: 🎓 I graduated from the West Ukrainian National University with a degree in 'Software Engineering'.
aboutMe.description4: 💡 I am passionate about developing full stack applications using React and Next.js, and I am constantly improving my skills.
aboutMe.description5: 🚀 My goal is to become better every day than I was yesterday.
